TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The MeAppisa is an app, to notify you about updates to your used npm packages.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Select your packages used in your projects in the search tab, or run a npm i meappisa to monitor your packages through our app.
